name: Invitation Consultants
overview:
InvitationConsultants.com is an eCommerce company that provides printed personalized invitations and announcements to consumers and businesses.

Here is a sample of the type of products that they provide: wedding invitations, rehearsal dinner invitations, birth announcements, graduation announcements, stationery, holiday cards, birthday invitations.

The company started in 1999 and is entirely self-funded. It was started by entrepreneur Allison De Meulder. Her husband, Olivier, joined the company a few years later. Allison has a marketing background and has a true passion for paper, Olivier has an IT background. Together they have the right mix of skills to fuel the company’s growth.

The company invests heavily in technology to improve user experience. They developed a state of the art tool to allow customers to preview their invitation. The tool also generates print-ready files that can be sent to printing facilities.

Some recent developments include a partnership with celebrity event designer Preston Bailey; Preston Bailey designed a line of wedding invitations for sale exclusively at InvitationConsultants.com.
